prompt:
Patient: Yes.

Patient: I have.

Nurse: Great, Mr. Alves. Let's first get all the logistics out of the way. Your colonoscopy procedure is scheduled for August 17 at 10:00 AM with Doctor Meredith Bailey. You'll need to arrive about 1 hour before at 9:00 AM. Is that okay with you?

Patient: Yes. It's okay with me.

Nurse: Perfect, Mr. Alves. Once you get to O'Connor hospital, your check-in location will be on the 1st Floor. Does that sound good to you?

Patient: Alves.

Nurse: I'm sorry, Mr. Alves, could you please confirm if the check-in location on the 1st Floor of O'Connor Hospital sounds good to you?

Patient: I said Alves.

responses.gpt4: I'm sorry, Mr. Alves, could you please confirm if the check-in location on the 1st Floor of O'Connor Hospital sounds good to you?
responses.our_model: I apologize for the confusion, Mr. Alves. I want to make sure you're comfortable with all the details. Is the check-in location on the 1st Floor of O'Connor Hospital acceptable to you?
